ground_truth: For Family Imposture the Punishment of an Impostor
himself shall be as follows.
1. He shall be punished ignominiously and afflictively with the
Impostor's Mask. See [Punishments]
transcription: For Family Imposition the Punishment of an Imposer

ground_truth: 2. He shall be imprisoned or confined to hard Labour for Life.
